title: Still haven't gotten the Riot Kayle and Kayle gift
body: I still haven't gotten the Riot Kayle and Kayle part of the 10th anniversary give away

replies.body:
The gifts are still being distributed. The 23rd is the final day, so if you don't receive them by then, you can submit a support ticket.

> Due to the nature of this particular gift and the way it varies by account, we’re not able to simultaneously grant it to everyone. This means it may take a few days for the gift to show on your account. We’re asking for a bit of patience through next week as we pick up all the stragglers—if you don’t have it by 9/23, let Player Support know. Additionally, players using the alpha League client may receive the gift but not a notice—double-check your account before opening a ticket.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you

Gifts are still being sent out to the massive amount of players, and will take some time.  Stay updated through our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Just hang on until all of this is wrapped up!
